title: Banana poppy seed pancakes
ingredients: ['120g wholemeal flour', '125g plain flour', '4 teaspoons baking powder', '2 teaspoons poppy seeds', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 eggs', '475ml milk', '2 ripe bananas, mashed', '4 tablespoons coconut oil, melted', '2 tablespoons honey', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '70g fresh blueberries (optional)']
